long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Daily Wisdom is your go-to tool for daily motivation and wisdom. Start your day with a random inspirational quote, and easily explore quotes from your favorite authors. Select from a curated list of renowned authors and get instantly inspired by their timeless wisdom. Perfect for adding a spark of positivity to your day, this extension brings you closer to the thoughts and insights of the world's greatest minds.
